1.content:

You soul, for lack of a better word, was being burnt right out of your physical form. But it couldn't be destroyed, you were left drifting, falling, silently screaming.

When you awoke you had no idea where you were. It was a strange room in a strange house. Stranger still was the discovery that you were not yourself - your body was that of a middle aged man with no hair and a huge belly.

You panicked, scaring the hell out of the man's family as you tried to explain what had happened. Eventually you were sedated.

When you woke up it was the same story again; another place, another body. You had become young girl living with her parents This time you stayed a little more calm, but the result was the same. Eventually, exhausted from trying to find answers, you fell asleep only to wake up as someone else.

You understood at last that you could only hold onto a body while you were awake, and as soon as you became unconscious your soul drifted away.

You'd awake each day as another random person, sometimes miles away from your last form.

Who were you to begin with?

info.brief_description: Thanks to an ancient demon, you wake up possessing a different body every morning.
info.description:
Your own body, is out there somewhere, if only you can find it!

The demon was stripped of its physical form and needed a human body - you were in the wrong place at the wrong time and it chose yours. Your physical body stolen, you are now as incorporeal as the demon was before you. You exist only by jumping from body to body, your consciousness drifting to find a new home at random every time you fall asleep.


(AUTHOR SAYS: You can go pretty much anywhere you want with this story, providing a reasonable amount of effort is put into the writing, and there are NO sexual scenes involving anyone under the age of 16)

Your own body, is out there somewhere, if only you can find it!
